item.title: A Field Report From the O’Reilly Software Architecture in Berlin
item.description: Last week, we were at the O’Reilly Software Architecture in Berlin. In this article we share our key learnings and takeaways with you.

item.title: How to dispatch flux to worker in Reactor
item.description: This post shows how to dispatch a flux of items to services of separated functional domains when using Reactor in Java.
